metadata.title: CVE-2017-11104 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Knot DNS before 2.4.5 and 2.5.x before 2.5.2 contains a flaw within the TSIG protocol implementation that would allow an attacker with a valid key name and algorithm to bypass TSIG authentication if no additional ACL restrictions are set, because of an improper TSIG validity period check.

criterions.comment: knot package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.5-3').
